de.erichseifert.gral.plots

Class PlotArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.erichseifert.gral.graphics.AbstractDrawable
      • de.erichseifert.gral.plots.StylableDrawable
        • de.erichseifert.gral.plots.PlotArea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable, SettingsListener, SettingsStorage, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PiePlot.PiePlotArea2D, XYPlot.XYPlotArea2D

    public abstract class PlotArea
extends StylableDrawable
    Abstract class that represents a canvas on which plot data will be drawn. It serves as base for specialized implementations for different plot types. Derived classes have to implement how the actual drawing is done.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Key BACKGROUND
      Key for specifying the Paint instance to be used to paint the background of the plot area.
      static Key BORDER
      Key for specifying the Stroke instance to be used to paint the border of the plot area.
      static Key CLIPPING
      Key for specifying an Insets2D instance that defines the clipping of the plotted data relative to the plot area.
      static Key COLOR
      Key for specifying the Paint instance to be used to fill the border of the plot area.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlotArea()
      Initializes a new instance with default background color and border.

    • Field Detail

      • BACKGROUND

        public static final Key BACKGROUND
        Key for specifying the Paint instance to be used to paint the background of the plot area.

      • BORDER

        public static final Key BORDER
        Key for specifying the Stroke instance to be used to paint the border of the plot area.

      • COLOR

        public static final Key COLOR
        Key for specifying the Paint instance to be used to fill the border of the plot area.

      • CLIPPING

        public static final Key CLIPPING
        Key for specifying an Insets2D instance that defines the clipping of the plotted data relative to the plot area. Positive inset values result in clipping inside the plot area, negative values result in clipping outside the plot area. Specifying a null values will turn off clipping.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlotArea

        public PlotArea()
        Initializes a new instance with default background color and border.
